thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 22 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ooma Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.19

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ooma Reports Q1 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.19
text:
May 22 (Reuters) - Ooma Inc:
* OOMA REPORTS FIRST QUARTER FISCAL YEAR 2019 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q2 2019 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.04 TO $0.07
* SEES FY 2019 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.13 TO $0.23
* SEES Q2 2019 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 TO $0.22 * Q1 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.04
* SEES Q2 2019 REVENUE $30.5 MILLION TO $31.3 MILLION * Q1 REVENUE $30.2 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $29.7 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2019 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.18, REVENUE VIEW $124.9 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.05, REVENUE VIEW $30.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
